amendment.description: To provide for the use of funds from the Indian Irrigation Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3563 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3563 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Barrasso to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5500) To provide for the use of funds from the Indian Irrigation Fund.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3563 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Barrasso to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3563 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
